qas.question: When can i request a mobility pass in chile?

answers.text: 14-days after completing a full COVID-19 vaccination course in Chile

qas.question: Where can i check if i am eligible for a chilean mobility pass?

answers.text: eligibility criteria on the Chile Government website

paragraphs.context: You may obtain a Mobility Pass if you fulfill the eligibility criteria on the Chile Government website. This will generate a QR-code after entering your personal information. This permit can only be requested 14-days after completing a full COVID-19 vaccination course in Chile (i.e. after the second dose for a two-dose course COVID-19 vaccine such as AstraZeneca, Pfizer, etc).

qas.question: Can i travel in chile when i am in quarantine?

answers.text: you are not allowed interregional travel if you are in quarantine

paragraphs.context: You should be aware that you are not allowed interregional travel if you are in quarantine after arriving in Chile. Non-resident foreign nationals will need to hold a valid Mobility Pass.
